0.text: Innate: Shaco's basic attacks deal 20 − 35 (based on level) (+ 25% bonus AD) bonus physical damage when hitting an enemy from behind, which is affected by  critical strike modifiers.

1.text: Deceive and  Two-Shiv Poison have additional effects when they hit an enemy from behind.

0.text: Active: Shaco becomes  invisible for a few seconds, and after a 0.125-second delay he  blinks to the target location.

1.text: Deceive's  invisibility breaks when Shaco uses a basic attack or casts  Two-Shiv Poison, but not from casting  Hallucinate.

2.text: After breaking the invisibility, Shaco's next basic attack within 0.25 seconds deals bonus physical damage, which is affected by  critical strike modifiers.

3.text: Backstab Bonus: The attack will  critically strike for (30% +  35%) bonus physical damage.

4.text: Deceive will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Shaco summons a box at the target location that becomes  stealthed after arming over 2 seconds, lasting for up to 40 (+ 10% AP) seconds. The box is  invulnerable and  untargetable to enemies while stealthed.

1.text: The box will spring out upon enemy contact,  fearing nearby enemies and reducing their  movement speed for 2 seconds, modified against  champions, who are also  rooted for 0.5 seconds. Enemy champions have their movement speed set to a static 100, reduced to a static 60 for non-champions.

2.text: The box will remain for 5 seconds, during which it will automatically fire at nearby  visible enemies every 0.5 seconds, dealing magic damage with each attack that is increased against  monsters and reduced by 50% against  structures. If the box attacks only one target, it deals increased damage.

3.text: See Pets for more details about boxes.

0.text: Passive: Shaco's basic attacks  slow enemies for 2 seconds while Two-Shiv Poison is not on cooldown.

1.text: Active: Shaco throws a dagger at the target enemy that deal magic damage,  increased by 50% if they are below 30% of their maximum health, and  slows them for 3 seconds.

2.text: Backstab Bonus: The dagger deals an additional 15 − 50 (based on level) (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage, increased to 22.5 − 75 (based on level) (+ 15% AP) when the target is below 30% of their maximum health.

0.text: Active: Shaco  vanishes for 0.5 seconds and  blinks in the target direction while creating a  clone of himself that is summoned in the opposite direction, remaining within control range of him as a controllable  clone for up to 18 seconds. Hallucinate can be recast at any time while the clone is alive, and can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.

1.text: Recast: Shaco commands the  clone to move to the target location.

2.text: The clone will explode upon dying or expiring, which deals magic damage to nearby enemies and deploys three  mini-boxes that activate instantly,  fearing nearby enemies for 1 second.

3.text: The boxes possess Jack in the Box's effects, except they have a doubled, but shared  health, and deal modified magic damage with each attack, increased when attacking a single unit.

4.text: See Pets for more details about Shaco's clone.
